T02D1573:1b-1: shukla badzra b'a r'a h'i s'a dha nam /
T02D1573:1b-3: rdo rje phag mo dkar mo'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1573:1b-4: rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1573:1b-5: blo ngan sreg brtson mi snyan [dd] 'joms mdzad pa'i //
T02D1573:1b-6: 'gro tshogs dug gzir 'bad med grol bar byed //
T02D1573:1b-7: rab mnyam bde ldan rdo rje phag lha mo //
T02D1573:1b-8: kong ka sbyin btud sgrub thabs bri bar bya //
T02D1573:1b-9: de la nub mo thun phyed lus pa dang cho ga bzhin du langs te /
T02D1573:1b-10: dur khrod la sogs pa yid dang mthun pa'i gnas zhig tu tsandan la sogs byugs la /
T02D1573:1b-11: me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nye bar brgyan te /
T02D1573:1b-12: dngos su ro'i gdan la ji ltar bde bar 'dug ste /
T02D1573:1b-13: byams pa la sogs pa sngon du song bas rang
T02D1573:1b-14: gi snying gar yi ge aam las skyes pa'i nyi
T02D1573:1b-15: ma'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge hr'i: dkar po'i 'od
T02D1573:1b-16: zer gyi tshogs kyis gsal bar bya ste rdo rje
T02D1573:1b-18: bla ma dang rnal 'byor ma dang byang chub sems
T02D1573:1b-19: dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gnas ji lta
T02D1573:1b-20: bar mdun du yang dag par dmigs la /
T02D1573:2a-1: bon las byung ba'i rab tu gtum mo dang /
T02D1573:2a-2: gtum pa'i mig can ma dang /
T02D1573:2a-7: lang ka'i dbang phyug ma dang /
T02D1573:2a-8: shing grib ma ste thugs kyi 'khor lo brgyad dang /
T02D1573:2a-11: rlung gi shugs can ma dang /
T02D1573:2a-13: lha mo sngo bsangs ma dang /
T02D1573:2a-16: kha ga na ste gsung gi 'khor lo brgyad do //
T02D1573:2a-24: brtson chen ma ste sku'i 'khor lo'i brgyad rnams so //
T02D1573:2a-30: rnam par snang mdzad dbul 'chang ba ste /
T02D1573:2a-31: zla ba'i gdan la spyan gsum pa phyag rgya lnga rnam par 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1573:2a-35: thod pa'i phreng ba rtse gsum pa dbu la bcings shing brgyan pa'o //
T02D1573:2a-38: kha tv'am dang ldan pa'i phyag gi yal ga mchod
T02D1573:2b-0: pas sbrel @2b ba rnams kyis aargha la sogs pa
T02D1573:2b-1: rnams kyi mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa
T02D1573:2b-4: slan chad mi byed par sdom pa dang /
T02D1573:2b-5: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D1573:2b-6: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D1573:2b-11: bskul ba rnams cho ga bzhin du byas te /
T02D1573:2b-12: bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba byas nas stong pa
T02D1573:2b-13: nyid kyi ye shes bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir mgo
T02D1573:2b-15: tshig brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1573:2b-16: de la tshig ni aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a
T02D1573:2b-17: sam shrim t'a: sarba satva ni sarba siddhi aa: sam
T02D1573:2b-18: parya nti sarba ta th'a ga ta shtsa aa dhishtha
T02D1573:2b-19: na ti / aom sv'a bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sv'a bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02D1573:2b-20: de nas ma chos bya dang /
T02D1573:2b-23: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1573:2b-25: smon pa med pa'i rnam pas rmi lam gyi shes
T02D1573:2b-26: pa bzhin du so sor rang gis rig par bya
T02D1573:2b-27: ba lhag par mos par bya ste /
T02D1573:2b-28: snying ga'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis snang ba med par byas nas /
T02D1573:2b-29: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a pa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1573:2b-30: zhes bya ba la nga rgyal bya'o //
T02D1573:2b-31: de nas rang gi sems pam dmar po'i gzugs su grub ste /
T02D1573:2b-32: de yongs su gyur pa las padma dmar po'i steng
T02D1573:2b-33: du aa las skyes pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D1573:2b-34: gnas pa'i hr'i: dkar pos mtshan pa'i rdo rje cung
T02D1573:2b-35: zad dmar ba bsgoms nas spro ba dang /
T02D1573:2b-36: bsdu ba sngon du 'gro bas de yongs su gyur pa las lo bcu drug gi rnam pa /
T02D1573:2b-37: ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba /
T02D1573:2b-38: spyan gsum dmar zhing zlum pa /
T02D1573:2b-39: cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal me tog sna
T02D1573:2b-40: tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i sgra phyed bcings shing grol bar
T02D1573:2b-41: mdzes pa'o // rdo rje phreng ba nag po gnyis
T02D1573:2b-42: kyi dbus su thod pa gsum byas pa'i phreng ba
T02D1573:2b-43: mdzes pa'o // dbul bcings pa'o // 'khor lo dang /
T02D1573:2b-47: ske rags kyis brgyan pa ste /
T02D1573:3a-0: 'gying bas g-yas pa'i phyag gis yal ga na gnas pa'i dar dpyangs 'bar ba @3a * //
T02D1573:3a-2: gong du bstan pa'i rdo rjes mi shes pa'i skyes bu 'jigs par byed pa ste /
T02D1573:3a-3: g-yon na 'og tu rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i steng rdo rje rtse lnga pa /
T02D1573:3a-4: dbyug pa dkar po'i rjes su song ba'i mgo bo
T02D1573:3a-5: skam po dang rlon pa la sna tshogs rdo rje
T02D1573:3a-6: la gser gyi bum pa'i rtsa ba nas byung ba'i
T02D1573:3a-7: sgra 'khrol ba'i dril bu phra mo dang ldan pa
T02D1573:3a-8: / sna tshogs dar dbyangs kyis brgyan pa'i dpung pa la reg pa'i kha tv'am ga bsnams pa'o //
T02D1573:3a-9: bdud bzhi'i khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa'i snod 'dzin pa /
T02D1573:3a-10: rlon pa khrag 'dzag pa'i rgyu mas brgyus pa'i mgo bo nyi shu rtsa lnga'i phreng ba 'phyang pa /
T02D1573:3a-11: padma dmar po'i steng du nyi ma la gnas pa'i
T02D1573:3a-12: mi shes pa'i skyes bu la g-yas brkyang ba'i zhabs
T02D1573:3a-13: kyis bzhugs pa / gos dang bral ba rab tu rno ba'i nyi ma'i 'od 'phro ba can /
T02D1573:3a-15: gzugs brnyan lta bu'i sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa ;
T02D1573:3a-16: phyogs bcur sprul ba sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don
T02D1573:3a-17: byed pa'i mchog / nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi
T02D1573:3a-18: ge hr'i: sa mtshan pa'i rdo rje snying ga na
T02D1573:3a-19: yod pa'i rdo rje phag mor bdag nyid bsam par
T02D1573:3a-20: bya'o // de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon
T02D1573:3a-21: gyi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis sems can de dag
T02D1573:3a-22: gzugs su bskyed la bdag nyid la gzhug par bya'o
T02D1573:3a-23: bya'o // // rang nyid bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje phag mor nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1573:3a-24: de nas rang gi lte bar sna tshogs padma la
T02D1573:3a-25: dkar zhing dmar ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la yi
T02D1573:3a-26: ge hr'i: dkar po bltas nas sngags kyi phreng ba
T02D1573:3a-27: de bgrang phreng gi rnam pa lta bu dkar po
T02D1573:3a-28: 'khor lo 'khor ba'i sbyor ba zhal gyi khung bu
T02D1573:3a-30: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang /
T02D1573:3a-36: sgyu rtsal la sogs pa'i rig pa blangs te lte ba'i bu gar bcug nas /
T02D1573:3a-37: rang dang gzhan thams cad kyi mi shes pa sreg pa'i bdag nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1573:3a-38: de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od kyis bskul
T02D1573:3a-39: ba'i nam mkha' la gnas pa'i ye shes kyi lha
T02D1573:3a-40: mo mdun du bltas la sngon du gsungs pa'i tshogs
T02D1573:3b-0: kyis aargha la sogs pa sngon @3b du 'gro bas
T02D1573:3b-1: mchod de pheem gyi rnam pa'i sngags brjod la sngon
T02D1573:3b-2: bzhin 'bar ba'i phyag rgya bcings pas dpral bar g-yon
T02D1573:3b-3: du bskor zhing de bcug ste /
T02D1573:3b-4: de nas gcig tu gyur par bsgoms la sngags kyi nga rgyal bya'o //
T02D1573:3b-5: de la sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D1573:3b-6: aom yo ga shuddha: sarba dharm'a yo ga shuddho& ham /
T02D1573:3b-7: de'i snying gar sa bon de yis bskul te /
T02D1573:3b-8: nam mkha' la gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spyan drangs te /
T02D1573:3b-9: de rnams kyis de bzhin pa lnga'i bdag nyid bdud
T02D1573:3b-10: rtsi ldas gang ba'i bu ma pa bsnams pa dang
T02D1573:3b-11: / dis sprul pa sna tshogs pa'i rnga dang /
T02D1573:3b-17: glu dbyangs kyis lha dang lha ma yin gyis 'jo 'jo rnams ched du byed pa dang /
T02D1573:3b-21: dri zhim pa'i me tog gi char rab tu 'bab pa dang /
T02D1573:3b-22: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1573:3b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa khrus gsol ltar //
T02D1573:3b-24: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02D1573:3b-25: de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o //
T02D1573:3b-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs bcang brjod par bya zhing bdag la dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1573:3b-27: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shr'i ye h'um /
T02D1573:3b-28: zhes bya ba 'dis byin gyi brlabs la /
T02D1573:3b-29: de la sna tshogs padma dang rdo rje la gnas
T02D1573:3b-30: pa'i mi bskyod pas spyi bor byin gyis brlabs par
T02D1573:3b-31: bsam par bya'o // de nas des sprul pa'i rab
T02D1573:3b-32: tu gtum mo la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis
T02D1573:3b-33: des sbrul pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa
T02D1573:3b-34: rnams kyis bdag nyid la mchod la /
T02D1573:3b-35: 'og nas 'byung ba'i rim pa bzhin du bdud rtsi
T02D1573:3b-36: myang ba byas nas ji srid 'dod pa bsgom par
T02D1573:3b-39: 'gro bas myur ba la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral bas sngags bzlas par bya ste /
T02D1573:3b-40: de la sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D1573:3b-41: hr'i: gal te ldang bar 'dod na sngags kyi phreng
T02D1573:3b-42: ba lte bar bsams la hr'i'i yi ge'i nang du
T02D1573:3b-43: bcug ste mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas smon lam
T02D1573:3b-44: btab ste / bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba byas
T02D1573:3b-45: nas yi ge brgya pa lan gsum du brjod la
T02D1573:4a-0: btab ste / / lha mo'i brgyal dang @4a * //
T02D1573:4a-1: ldan pas chos thams cad de'i gzugs su rdzogs par bltas la ji ltar bde bas gnas par bya'o //
T02D1573:4a-2: de la yi ge brgya pa'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D1573:4a-3: aom badzra sa tva sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya /
T02D1573:4a-4: badzra sa tva tve no pa tishtha /
T02D1573:4a-7: aa nu rakto me bha wa /
T02D1573:4a-8: su po shyo me bha wa /
T02D1573:4a-10: sarba karma su tsa me tsittam shre ya: ku ru
T02D1573:4a-11: h'um ha ha ha ha ho: bha ga b'an sarba
T02D1573:4a-15: ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva a'a: h'um phat /
T02D1573:4a-16: ces bya ba'i thun mtshams gzhan la yang skad cig lha mo'i rnam pa mngon du byas la /
T02D1573:4a-17: mchod pa la sogs pa mngon du byas pa'i ji srid 'dod kyi bar bsgoms la /
T02D1573:4a-18: sdon bzhin du bzlas pa byas nas gong du bstan pa bzhin du thams cad bya'o //
T02D1573:4a-19: mtshan phyed kyi thun mtshams su sngon bzhin thams cad bya'o //
T02D1573:4a-20: nyal ba'i dus su sngas su sangs rgyas dang bla
T02D1573:4a-21: ma dang byang chub sems dpa' bltas nas yang dag
T02D1573:4a-22: par mchod do // de nas yan lag brgyad kyis
T02D1573:4a-23: phyag byed pa'i bsam pas seng ge'i khri la nyal
T02D1573:4a-24: par mchod do // bar bya'o // de nas tho
T02D1573:4a-25: rangs kyi thun mtshams su lha mo rnams kyis bskul
T02D1573:4a-26: te sngon bzhin du thams cad bya'o /
T02D1573:4a-28: // / yang na rim pa 'dis gnas kyi phyogs gcig
T02D1573:4a-29: tu sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bde ba'i stan
T02D1573:4a-30: la 'dug ste / snying rjes sems can la dmigs te /
T02D1573:4a-31: sdig pa bshags pa byas nas bzung ste ji srid
T02D1573:4a-32: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa sngon du 'gro
T02D1573:4a-33: bas yi ge aa yongs su gyur pa las rang
T02D1573:4a-34: gi lce padma'i 'dab ma'i rnam pa la /
T02D1573:4a-35: yi ge hr'i: 'od 'bar ba ji srid 'dod par bsgoms te /
T02D1573:4a-36: brtan par byas la brgya phyed kyi ri lu'i phreng
T02D1573:4a-37: ba bgrang phreng byas la thun mtshams gsum dang bzhir
T02D1573:4a-38: bzlas pa byed pa'i rnal 'byor ba nyal ba'i dus
T02D1573:4a-39: su sngon gyi cho gas nyal bar bya'o //
T02D1573:4a-41: bzlas pa'i bdag nyid can cho ga bzhin du rjes su gnang ba thob pa /
T02D1573:4a-42: 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad las grol ba /
T02D1573:4a-44: dam tshig dang sdom pa la gnas pa /
T02D1573:4b-0: @4b dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur ched du
T02D1573:4b-1: byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas 'bum phrag bdun bzlas pas
T02D1573:4b-2: bstan bcos dang sgyu rtsal thams cad kyi tshogs la
T02D1573:4b-4: 'dzin blo rno zhing dpa' bo 'jigs pa med pas
T02D1573:4b-5: zil gyis mi non cing rtsod pa mkhan du 'gyur
T02D1573:4b-6: ro // rims dang sbyar ba'i dug dang mkha' 'gro
T02D1573:4b-7: ma la sogs pa rnams kyis zil gyis gnon par
T02D1573:4b-8: ro // mi nus so // ci bzas pa bdud rtsir 'gyur ro //
T02D1573:4b-9: sngags kyi bzlas pa 'di 'grub na de'i sngags kyis thod le kor la mngon par bsngags te /
T02D1573:4b-10: gang gi lag par byin na de rmongs pa yin yang snyan ngag mkhan chen por 'gyur ro //
T02D1573:4b-11: de'i dri tsam gyis sbrul la sogs pa nye bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1573:4b-12: nye bar 'tshe ba de rnams kyis gtses pa gzhan
T02D1573:4b-13: rnams la yang dgos pa thams cad nus par gyur
T02D1573:4b-14: / mang du brjod par ci bya ste /
T02D1573:4b-15: blun po bdag gis kyang bstan bcos la nyon mongs
T02D1573:4b-16: pa ma byas par mi yeng ba'i sems kyis sngags
T02D1573:4b-17: 'di 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas pas shes rab sgron ma
T02D1573:4b-19: gang yang brtan pa'i sems kyis ni gong du bstan pa'i yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur te /
T02D1573:4b-20: de kun shin tu myur bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1573:4b-21: shes rab sgron ma'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga sems
T02D1573:4b-22: can gyi dbang du byas te de 'phags pa'i bden
T02D1573:4b-23: pa bzhi la zhugs par bya ba'i phyir dbang du
T02D1573:4b-24: bya ba'i cho ga brjod par bya ste /
T02D1573:4b-25: de la sngon du bstan pa'i cho ga'i rim pas yongs su rdzogs pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma /
T02D1573:4b-26: 'on kyang sa bon hr'i: dmar po dang phyag mtshan
T02D1573:4b-27: yongs su gyur pa las mdog dmar po bsgoms nas
T02D1573:4b-30: mi bskyod pa ni ye shes che //
T02D1573:4b-31: zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad kyis so //
T02D1573:4b-32: de nyid gsum las yang dag par byung ba kha
T02D1573:4b-33: 'og tu bltas pa'i thod pa gsum gyi steng du
T02D1573:4b-34: yi ge a'a: dmar po las skyes pa'i padma'i snod
T02D1573:4b-35: du dam tshig gis bcug ste /
T02D1573:4b-37: k'a li la sogs pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi gsal
T02D1573:4b-38: byed kyis byin gyis brlabs par bltas la 'og tu
T02D1573:4b-39: yam dang ram yongs su gyur pa las rlung dang
T02D1573:5a-2: dam tshig bkod pa'i sa bon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bkug ste nang du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1573:5a-3: dbyangs yig dang po las skyes pa'i zla ba'i dkyil
T02D1573:5a-4: 'khor gyi steng du h'um las skyes pa'i zla ba
T02D1573:5a-5: la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um gis byin gyis brlabs
T02D1573:5a-6: pa'i rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga las 'od zer
T02D1573:5a-7: gyi tshogs spros pas rdo rje 'chang yang bkug ste
T02D1573:5a-8: / zla ba dang rdo rje yang der zhugs pa las shin tu spyin pa dang /
T02D1573:5a-9: yang ba la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral te /
T02D1573:5a-10: de'i steng du yi ge aom bsams la /
T02D1573:5a-11: de'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdud rtsi'i ngo bor grub pa dang /
T02D1573:5a-12: 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs na gnas pa'i bdud rtsi yang de la bstim mo //
T02D1573:5a-13: aom yang der thim pa las ji lta ba bzhin rdzogs pa'i bdud rtsir bltas la /
T02D1573:5a-14: lan gsum du de nyid gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs
T02D1573:5a-15: la cho ga bzhin du bdud rtsi myang bar byas
T02D1573:5a-16: te / ji srid 'dod kyi bar du bsgom pa
T02D1573:5a-17: byas nas rang gi ming gi yi ge dang po
T02D1573:5a-18: yongs su gyur pa las bsgrub bya mdun du bltas
T02D1573:5a-19: te / la / sngags kyi phreng ba de las
T02D1573:5a-20: byung ba'i 'od zer gyis de blangs te de'i nang
T02D1573:5a-22: sems aa yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shin tu dmar bar bsams la /
T02D1573:5a-23: sngags kyi phreng ba de las byung ba'i lha mo
T02D1573:5a-24: mdog dmar mo g-yon pa'i phyag na dh'i:'i rnam pa'i
T02D1573:5a-26: g-yas pa'i phyag na dmar po kha phye ba lta bu'i rnam pa'i rdo rje lcags gyu bzung ste ;
T02D1573:5a-27: bsgrub bya sngon du bltas par bsams la /
T02D1573:5a-28: aom a'a: dh'i: che ge mo tsitta a'a karsha ya
T02D1573:5a-29: h'um dza: zhes bya bas de la rnal 'byor pas
T02D1573:5a-30: bka' bsgo'o // de nas lha mo des cho ga
T02D1573:5a-31: bzhin du zhugs te zhags pa 'dis yang dag par
T02D1573:5a-32: bzung zhing lcags dgug cing ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D1573:5a-33: rang gi sems la zhugs par bya'o //
T02D1573:5a-34: lha mo'i sngags kyi phreng ba'i nang du zhugs par blta'o //
T02D1573:5a-36: myos pa 'gul mi nus shing 'dod pa gcig tu
T02D1573:5a-37: gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa las lag pa thal
T02D1573:5a-38: mo sbyor zhing sgrub pa po la mngon du phyogs
T02D1573:5b-0: rdo rje phag mo @5b dkar mo sgrub pa'i thabs
T02D1573:5b-1: slob dpon kong ka sbyin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
T02D1573:5b-3: / // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta rakshi ta'i zhal snga nas dang /
